com.kinvey
Interface AppdataStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
CachedStore
public interface AppdataStore

This interface is an abstract collection of entities. Implementations of this interface will often times be used to cache data locally for a better optimal retrieval of the data.

Usage

The CachedStore must is backed by a MappedAppdata collection and MappedEntity class. 

 MappedAppdata mMappedAppdata = mKcsClient.mappeddata("itemCollectionName");
 AppdataStore mCachedStore = (AppdataStore) mKcsClient.cacheddata(mMappedAppdata, ItemEntity.class);
 
 SimpleQuery q = new SimpleQuery();
 q.addCriteria("field1", "==", "value1");
 mCachedStore.query(q, new ListCallback() {
     public void onFailure(Throwable t) {
         showAlert(t.getMessage());
     }
 
     public void onSuccess(List itemEntities) {
         mItemEntities = itemEntities;
     }
 
 });

Method Detail

save

<T> T save(MappedEntity instance)
       throws KinveyException
Create or updates the object. Used in special cases where the calling code would like to run the network request in its own thread. Saves the current state of the mapped class to Kinvey data storage.

Warning: network requests should be run using a background thread, look at using save(MappedEntity, ScalarCallback) instead.

Parameters:
instance - the instance of the class to perform the mapping during save
Throws:
KinveyException

save

<T> void save(MappedEntity instance,
              ScalarCallback<T> callback)
Create or update the current state of the mapped class to Kinvey data storage.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of entity being saved
Parameters:
instance - the instance of the class to perform the mapping during save
Throws:
MappingException - when the MappedEntity is not properly structured

query

<T> List<T> query(Query query)
              throws KinveyException
Query for data against the configured applications appdata. Warning: network requests should be run using a background thread, look at using save(MappedEntity, ScalarCallback) instead.

Parameters:
query - a collection of condition that should be met before an entity is returned
Returns:
list of entities returned by the query
Throws:
KinveyException

query

<T> void query(Query query,
               ListCallback<? extends MappedEntity> callback)
An asynchronous version

Parameters:
query - a collection of condition that should be met before an entity is returned
callback - invoked once the query completes
